Louisiana Sports Hall of Fame & Northwest Louisiana History Museum

Natchitoches

Address

800 Front Street  
Natchitoches, LA 71457  
  
[GET DIRECTIONS](http://web.archive.org/web/20260104042947/https://goo.gl/maps/VTkdXmUoKovNyzNHA)

Hours

Tuesdays–Saturdays  
10:00 a.m.–4:30 p.m.

###### Last ticket sale at 4:00 p.m.   
Closed on Sundays, Mondays, and state holidays

Contact

318-357-2492  
800-568-6968

Admissions

#### [Get Tickets](http://web.archive.org/web/20260104042947/https://ticketing.louisianastatemuseum.org/webstore/shop/viewitems.aspx?cg=natchitoches&c=shoftkts)

$6 for Adults  
$5 for Seniors, Active Military, & Students with ID  
FREE for Children 6 & Under  
  
Available Discounts: 

  * Get $2 off each additional ticket when purchasing tickets to multiple Louisiana State Museums simultaneously.
  * Group Discount (15+ with reservation) receive 20% off admission
  * 10% Discount for AAA Members

Accessibility

This museum is fully wheelchair accessible with elevator access to each floor. Services animals, as defined under the Americans with Disabilities Act, are welcomed. If you have any questions about planning your visit, please contact our office at 318-357-2492 or email [[email protected]](/web/20260104042947/https://louisianastatemuseum.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#6f060109002f03001a061c060e010e1c1b0e1b0a021a1c0a1a021c41001d08).

Education

admission_text:
[ __ ](https://i0.wp.com/lasportshall.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/LSHOF-team-museum-upstairs-scaled.jpg?fit=2560%2C1821&ssl=1)

The Louisiana Sports Hall of Fame Foundation has generated $85,000 over the past two years to support the Louisiana Sports Hall of Fame Museum through its “Join the TEAM” membership drive.

First launched in 2023, Year Three of the membership drive began on November 1. LSHOF Foundation CEO Ronnie Rantz expressed appreciation for support received over the past two years.

“Membership drive monies enabled the foundation to initiate upgrades at the museum which otherwise would not have been possible,” said Rantz, who noted that the museum located in the Natchitoches Historic District is now over 12 years old and will continue to require aesthetic and technology updates to keep it among the best in the country. Rantz also said that LSHOF Foundation funds helped with renovation at the museum in time for the 2025 induction weekend following an electrical fire in the building on January 5.

There are four levels of membership – Starter ($120), Captain ($240), All-Star ($500), and Hall of Famer ($1,000). Individuals and businesses can join with an annual payment or with a monthly bank draft for as little as $10-$20 per month. Payment can be made online at lasportshall.com or by sending a check to 500 Front Street, Natchitoches, LA 71457.

Every Year Three member will receive a newly created LSHOF 24” X 18” color poster featuring some of the most well-know...
